name: Plugin Name: Simplify Mortgage Calculation
author: Sourav Mondal

sections.description:
WordPress Simplify Mortgage Calculation lets you do the Calculate how much you can afford spending per month on your mortgage/loan payment with this plugin.

Author Email: souravmondal10@gmail.com
Author Website: http://souravmondal.co.in

Features

  • Easy to Install.
  • very lightweight.
  • available in shortcode for page or post and also in widget element.

Notes

*If you face any problem or find any bugs ,then please let me know.I will fix that.You cooperation is expected.
sections.installation:
Normal installation

  1. Download the simplify-mortgage-calculation.zip file to your computer.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Upload the simplify-mortgage-calculation directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

That’s it. You can use the the plugin by using the short code [Mortgage_Calculator] in your page content ro you can call it custom templates php code.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Fixed Mortgage amount and downpayment related issue.

short_description: A simple jquery based mortgage calculator.Use Shortcode [Mortgage_Calculator] in page or use the widget in sidebar to use the plugin.
